document.masterDocTitle: West African pholcid spiders: an overview, with descriptions of five new species (Araneae, Pholcidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: West African pholcid spiders: an overview, with descriptions of five new species (Araneae, Pholcidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
14.
Pehrforsskalia conopyga Deeleman-Reinhold & van Harten, 2001
. Guinea, Sierra Leone, Ivory Coast, Nigeria (Deeleman-Reinhold & van Harten 2001 ; Huber 2009 ); newly recorded for The Gambia and Ghana.

THE GAMBIA : 2 ♀♀ in ZFMK , Banjul, Abuko Nature Reserve ( 13°23.5’N , 16°39.0’W ), primary gallery forest ,
17 Oct. 2008
( Yu.M. Marusik )
.

IVORY COAST : 1 ♂ 7 ♀♀ in MRAC ( 227392 part), Bouaké [ 7°41’N , 5°02’W ], WARDA station, weed management experiment, upland rice ,
13 Aug. 1995
( A. Russell-Smith )
;
5 ♂♂ 2 ♀♀ in MRAC ( 225855 ), Gagnoa [ 6°08’N , 5°57’W ], upland rice ,
10 Apr. 1995
( A. Russell-Smith )
;
1 ♂ 2 ♀♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 5171 ), Bobayo near Gagnoa [ 6°01.6’N , 6°01.9’W ], in upland rice ,
26 Aug. 1992
( A. Russell-Smith )
;
1 ♂ 1 ♀ 2 juvs in ZFMK ( Ar 5170 ), “Kroutla” nr. Oumé [~ 6°23’N , 5°25’W ],
26 Aug. 1992
( A. Russell- Smith )
.

GHANA : Eastern Region : 1 ♂ 3 ♀♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 10485 ),
Atewa Hills, Atewa Atwirebu Reserve
( 6°13.8’N , 0°33.5’W ),
740 m
a.s.l.,
25 Feb. 2013
( B.A. Huber )
;
2 ♀♀ 1 juv. in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Gha 136 ), same data
;
1 ♂ 1 ♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 10486 ),
Atewa Hills, Atewa Atwirebu Reserve
( 6°13.8’N , 0°32.4’W ),
500 m
a.s.l., degraded forest along road ,
24 Feb. 2013
( B.A. Huber )
;
1 ♂ 7 ♀♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 10487 ), near Mpraeso ( 6°34.1’N , 0°43.9’W ),
370 m
a.s.l., degraded forest near road ,
10 Mar. 2013
( B.A. Huber )
.
Volta Region : 3 ♂♂ 6 ♀♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 10488 ), Agumatsa Wildlife Sanctuary, Wli waterfall ( 7°06.2’N , 0°36.0’E ), ~
300 m
a.s.l., forest near waterfall ,
27 Feb. 2013
( B.A. Huber )
;
2 ♀♀ in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Gha 163 ), same data
;
5 ♂♂ 4 ♀♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 10489 ), Tagbo waterfall ( 7°00.7’N , 0°34.4’E ), ~
500 m
a.s.l., forest near waterfall ,
28 Feb. 2013
( B.A. Huber )
.
Ashanti Region : 1 ♂ 4 ♀♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 10490 ),
Bomfobiri Wildlife Sanctuary
( 6°57.3’N , 1°11.1’W ),
160 m
a.s.l., forest near river ,
3 Mar. 2013
( B.A. Huber )
;
1 ♀ 1 juv. in pure ethanol, in ZFMK ( Gha 132 ), same data
.
Brong Ahafo Region : 1 ♂ 1 ♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 10491 ), Booyem ( 7°39.9’N , 1°57.4’W ),
450 m
a.s.l., at large rocks ,
4 Mar. 2013
( B.A. Huber )
;
1 ♂ 2 ♀♀ in ZFMK ( Ar 10492 ),
Kintampo Falls
( 8°05.3’N , 1°41.9’W ),
280 m
a.s.l., degraded forest along stream ,
